of 23 kg *		 2 luggage

(business)

of 32 kg *		 2 luggage
of 32 kg *		 3 luggage
of 32 kg *		 1 piece of 32 kg luggage for
connecting passengers
(regional flights).

 

For more details visit : http://www.aircaraibes.com/Baggage/Baggage-Information
